_header: What shall I say to whom shall I complain
_description: A Compleynt of unfairness — three 8-line stanzas

BodFair16.First Lines:
What schall I say to whom schall I compleynI wot not who wyll on my
                    forus rewe…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…But for to thynk how my sorous reneweThus to endure yt is a
                    wondir thyng
BodFair16.Facsimiles:
Norton-Smith,  John. 
             “Introduction.” 
             Bodleian Library MS Fairfax 16.
         London: Scolar Press, 1979.
